title: 1st U.S. Dog With COVID-19 Has Died, And There's A Lot We Still Don't Know
description: Buddy, an adult German shepherd from Staten Island, was the first dog in the U.S. to test positive for the coronavirus. His death reveals just how little we know about COVID-19 and pets. Natasha Daly reported on Buddy's story exclusively for National Geographic.
